title: anandhamE paramanandhamE
sahitya:
AnandamE paramAnandamE ciTrambalak-kUttanai anbu sheidAl



anupallavi



nAnattilE para mOnattilE nidAnattilE vaLar dhyAnattilE kalandAl



caraNam 1



bhaktiyilE nenjam attiyilE citta shuddhiyilE Atma shaktiyilE uNar

tattuvanai shOdi sattuvanaik-kUDi nittiyamAna shivan mukti

kiDaittuviTTAl



caraNam 2



pAshamaTrE manap-pUshalaTrE veLi vESamaTrE dvESamaTrE vEru

pEshalaTRe aruL nEshamuTrE shiva dAsanAic-cidambara nEshanAi vAzndiDin
